poems.title: The Alley Less Traveled
poems.bio: Douglas William Garcia Mowbray lives in Waverly with his wife and son. He is co-founder of Poetry in Community, and an Assistant Director of the Baltimore Community Poetry Library.

poems.title: The City that Breathes
poems.bio: Douglas William Garcia Mowbray lives in Waverly with his wife and son. He is co-founder of Poetry in Community, and an Assistant Director of the Baltimore Community Poetry Library.

poems.title: Tender Bricks
poems.bio: Sean Morrissey currently serves as artist-in-residence at the Johns Hopkins Children's Center and is an active member of the Right to Housing Alliance.

poems.title: Judge me not
poems.bio: Taylor M. King is 24, and a single mother. She played Zenobia in season four of The Wire, and in May of 2015 was included in the cast of Listen to Your Mother. She lives in Baltimore and dreams of becoming a published author.

poems.title: Ode to dead black Baltimore boys
poems.bio: Chin-yer Wright is the founder and executive director of the the Baltimore Scene art movement. She organizes the cityâ€™s Word War poetry slam series, the Baltimore Crown Awards, Rap God, and other artistic events for youth and artists.
